ch.ethz.inf.vs.persistingservice
Class PersistingServer

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.Endpoint
      ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.LocalEndpoint
          ch.ethz.inf.vs.persistingservice.PersistingServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.MessageHandler, ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.MessageReceiver
public class PersistingServer
extends ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.LocalEndpoint

The Class PersistingServer starts the persisting server and creates and starts a couchdb connection.

The persisting server port can be defined in the Califorinium.properties file. The couchdb connection uses couchdb's standard port of 5984.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main method creates a new persitingservice object and starts the persisting service server. It also establishes a connection to the couchdb database and starts the http client to access the database.

Parameters:
args - the arguments
